text: Putnam) Festive in Death is the 39th book written by Nora Roberts under the pseudonym of J.D Robb.Robb, J. (2014). Festive in death. New York: Putnam Adult. == Plot summary == Eve Dallas is a homicide detective who investigates a list of women who were romanced by a murdered personal trainer during the pre-Christmas party season. ==References== ==External links== * In Death series order Category:In Death (novel series) Category:2014 American novels Category:Christmas novels
title: Festive in Death
